10: Upper logic
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Top: Start
10_s1_e0: [General] lower-level state map switching
10_s2: High rank: search enemy
10_s2_w0: [Search enemy] Character _ target setting
10_s3: Top: non-target behavior
10_s3_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s3_e1: [Operation] Lock off
10_s4: Top: Target action: Preparation
10_s5: Top: target behavior
10_s5_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s5_e1: [Operation] Lock on
10_s6: Top: generator feedback
10_s6_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s7: Top: Target action: General purpose _SubState
x0: Top: Target action: General purpose
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: Target action: start
x0_s2: Target action: starting error
x0_s3: Target action: favorite
x0_s3_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x0_s3_w0: [Operation] Lock on
x0_s4: Target action: Onijima
x0_s4_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x0_s4_w0: [Operation] Lock on
x0_s5: End state
